entry.title: Paradigms of AI Programming in Hy
entry.summary: I'm totally "hy-ped" about the Hy programming language. Last post I mentioned I was reading Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming in my free time. I now decided to follow it along using Hy, and I'll keep my answers to the exercises on a GitHub repository. Hy makes a lot of …
entry.content: I'm totally "hy-ped" about the Hy programming language. Last post I mentioned I was reading Paradigms of Artificial Intelligence Programming in my free time. I now decided to follow it along using Hy, and I'll keep my answers to the exercises on a GitHub repository. Hy makes a lot of lisp stuff possible in Python, it's really fun! I'll try to keep the same naming used by the author for the files in the git repo.
